Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: நயன்சாரா நன்மையின் நீக்கும் பயன்சாராப்பண்பில்சொல் பல்லா ரகத்து.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The words devoid of profit or pleasure which a man speaks will, being inconsistent with virtue, remove him from goodness.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is shown speaking words that are without profit and without character ('பயன் சாராப் பண்பில் சொல்') in a large assembly.
Layered_Composition.Midground: The person is standing on a beautiful, green path of 'Goodness' or 'Virtue' ('நன்மை', 'நயன்').
Layered_Composition.Background: The useless words they speak are visualized as a powerful, unnatural wind that blows directly out of their own mouth. This self-generated wind is so strong that it literally pushes them off the path of goodness ('நன்மையின் நீக்கும்'), sending them tumbling into a barren wasteland.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Speaking useless and characterless words in public is a self-destructive act that will physically remove a person from the path of goodness and justice.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The words as a self-generated, destructive wind is the key metaphor. The path of goodness is a stable place, but the person's own actions are what cause their expulsion from it. The fall is a direct result of their own speech.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The path of goodness is bright and verdant. The wind of useless words is a grey, dusty vortex. As the person is blown off the path, they are plunged from a world of color into a desolate, colorless wasteland.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A dynamic shot that shows the person speaking and the immediate, powerful effect of the 'wind of their own words' blowing them off the path.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with strong particle and wind effects.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: A dramatic shift from the bright light of the good path to the bleak light of the wasteland.

Cultural_Anchors: Profitless, characterless words (பயன் சாராப் பண்பில் சொல்)
Will remove one from justice and goodness (நயன் சாரா நன்மையின் நீக்கும்)
